metadata.title: CVE-2021-21394 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Synapse is a Matrix reference homeserver written in python (pypi packagematrix-synapse). Matrix is an ecosystem for open federated InstantMessaging and VoIP. In Synapse before version 1.28.0 Synapse is missinginput validation of some parameters on the endpoints used to confirmthird-party identifiers could cause excessive use of disk space and memoryleading to resource exhaustion. Note that the groups feature is not part ofthe Matrix specification and the chosen maximum lengths are arbitrary. Notall clients might abide by them. Refer to referenced GitHub securityadvisory for additional details including workarounds.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
